componentDescription: A button based label for placing inside TableCell for column sorting.

propDescriptions.active: If true, the label will have the active styling (should be true for the sorted column).
propDescriptions.children: Label contents, the arrow will be appended automatically.
propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.hideSortIcon: Hide sort icon when active is false.

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.

active.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if {{conditions}}.

icon.description: Styles applied to the icon component.

iconDirectionDesc.description: Styles applied to the icon component if {{conditions}}.

iconDirectionAsc.description: Styles applied to the icon component if {{conditions}}.
